article:
Have you ever met this situation ?You have a ticket for an _ film which you want to see very much,but unluckily,you will have to _ for an examination tomorrow .what will you do ?To see the film or study for the exam tonight ?If you give up seeing the film and work hard at your lesson,we will say, you have self-control.
Self-control is not _ you have from birth.It needs cultivating in your life Sometimes you are attracted by One of the stories that are not very meaningful or useful to you .You must _ your time well.You should n't spend your time reading such kind 0f book or you will feel _ afterwards.
Do not go to bed late because of a nice TV film,or you will go late to school the  next morning . you had better not stay in bed too late at weekends  either ,for it is a waste of valuable time. Every one of us has some _ .A few of them might Keep us from making progress in life. Then we must use our self-control  to become free of them.
Remember ,as a student,it is surely necessary to cultivate strong  self-control!
